#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        int a[n],b[n];
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            cin >> a[i];
            a[i] *= 3;
        }
        int t = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            cin >> b[i];
            b[i] += a[i];
            if (t < b[i])
                t = b[i];
        }
        cout << t << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
